song_lyrics: Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā gharo-gharne pāvan karavā,
Amerikānī puṇya bhūmī par, Akṣhardhām utāravā,
Pramukh Swāmīnā dṛuḍh sankalpe Varṇīrāj padhāriyā...
Jay jay ho... Jay jay ho... Nīlkanṭh Varṇīnī jay ho...
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Shrī Tapahpriyāya namah ।
Shrī Hima-giri-vana-priyāya namah । Shrī Pulahāshramavāsine namah ।
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā...
Bhakti Harinī Shrī Hari shīkhavatā, nihswārth sevā-bhāvanā urmā,
Aum Shrī Sadharma-bhakti-sangoptre namah । Aum Shrī Pavitrī-kṛuta-mānasāya namah ।
Deh tano anādar karatā, mān apamānnī paravā na manmā,
Jīv anantnu kalyāṇ karavā, tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā,
Jay Jay ho... Jay Jay ho... Nīlkanṭh Varṇīnī Jay ho...
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Shrī Tapahpriyāya namah ।
Shrī Hima-giri-vana-priyāya namah । Shrī Pulahāshramavāsine namah ।
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā...
Pragaṭ birājī āj avani par, avirat vicharatā nav-khanḍ dharā par,
Shrī Brahma-dvāraka-prākaṭyāya namah । Shrī Mūlākṣhara-Guṇātītaswarūpa-parichāyakāya namah ।
Naman ho Guṇātītanand Swāmīne, naman ho Bhagatjī Mahārājne,
Naman ho Shāstrījī Mahārājne, naman ho Yogījī Mahārājne,
Naman ho... Naman ho... Naman ho...
Pramukh Swāmī Mahārājne, Pramukh Swāmī Mahārājne...
Pragaṭ birājī āj avani par, avirat vicharatā nav-khanḍ dharā par,
Khoḷe mumukṣhu Hari pashchim deshe, Nīlkanṭh pragaṭ chhe Mahant swarūpe,
Naman ho... Naman ho... Naman ho Mahant Swāmīne...
Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā... Pragaṭ Prabhunī oḷakh āpavā,
Amerikānī puṇya bhūmī par Akṣhardhām utāravā...
Antarmā sukh shānti karavā Varṇīrāj padhāriyā,
Jay Jay ho... Jay Jay ho... Nīlkanṭh Varṇīnī Jay ho...
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Shrī Tapahpriyāya namah ।
Shrī Himagirivanapriyāya namah । Shrī Pulahāshramavāsine namah ।
Shrī Nīlakaṇṭhāya namah । Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā...
Jay ho Jay ho Nīlkanṭhno, Jay ho Jay ho Nīlkanṭhno,
Jay ho Jay ho Nīlkanṭhno, Jay ho Jay ho Nīlkanṭhno...
Shrī Nīlkaṇṭhāya namah...
title: Tapomūrti Nīlkanṭh padhāryā gharo-gharne pāvan karavā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1215: Kunal Vyas

Category: Prakirna Pad
